statements: SELECT * FROM medication_tracking;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_tracking WHERE usage_frequency = 3;
SELECT medication_name, notes, effectiveness_rating FROM medication_tracking WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM medication_tracking ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, usage_frequency FROM medication_tracking WHERE usage_frequency IS NOT NULL;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, usage_frequency FROM medication_tracking WHERE medication_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, dosage, notes FROM medication_tracking WHERE dosage > 10 AND effectiveness_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM medication_tracking WHERE usage_frequency IS NOT NULL ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, notes FROM medication_tracking WHERE usage_frequency BETWEEN 3 AND 7 AND dosage < 20 ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, dosage, notes FROM medication_tracking WHERE medication_name LIKE '%pain%' ORDER BY dosage ASC, effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT id, name, frequency FROM medications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM medication_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, name, dosage_taken FROM medications JOIN medication_usage ON medications.id = medication_usage.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, frequency FROM medications WHERE effectiveness = 'High' ORDER BY frequency ASC
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE frequency = 'Daily' AND dosage >= 100
SELECT id, name FROM medications WHERE dosage < 50 AND effectiveness = 'Medium'
SELECT * FROM medications INNER JOIN medication_usage ON medications.id = medication_usage.medication_id WHERE dosage_taken > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT id, name, dosage FROM Medications ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT id, name, frequency FROM Medications WHERE frequency > 3;
SELECT m.name, mu.dosage_taken, mu.date_taken FROM Medications m JOIN Medication_Usage mu ON m.id = mu.medication_id ORDER BY mu.date_taken DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND weight >= 60 ORDER BY last_name, first_name
SELECT m.name, mu.dosage_taken, mu.date_taken FROM Medications m INNER JOIN Medication_Usage mu ON m.id = mu.medication_id WHERE mu.dosage_taken BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY mu.date_taken ASC

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, p.gender, ma.name, mu.dosage_taken FROM Patients p LEFT JOIN Medication_Usage mu ON p.id = mu.patient_id LEFT JOIN Medications ma ON mu.medication_id = ma.id WHERE ma.effectiveness_rating > 3 ORDER BY p.last_name ASC

SELECT m.name AS medication_name, AVG(mu.dosage_taken) AS avg_dosage FROM Medications m INNER JOIN Medication_Usage mu ON m.id = mu.medication_id GROUP BY m.name HAVING AVG(mu.dosage_taken) > 25 ORDER BY avg_dosage DESC
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT symptom_name, severity FROM Symptoms WHERE severity >= 5;
SELECT name, treatment_outcome FROM Patients JOIN TreatmentResults ON Patients.patient_id = TreatmentResults.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE dosage >= 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, symptom_name, severity FROM Symptoms WHERE date_reported BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT medication_id, treatment_outcome, effectiveness_rating FROM TreatmentResults WHERE follow_up_date >= '2022-04-01' AND follow_up_date <= '2022-05-31' ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM Medications m JOIN TreatmentResults tr ON m.id = tr.medication_id WHERE tr.effectiveness_rating > 3 AND tr.treatment_outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT medications.medication_name, treatments.comments FROM medications INNER JOIN treatments ON medications.medication_id = treatments.prescription_id;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';

SELECT prescriptions.prescribed_date, prescriptions.dosage_instructions, medications.medication_name FROM prescriptions INNER JOIN medications ON prescriptions.medication_id = medications.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31'

SELECT prescriptions.prescription_id, patients.patient_name, medications.medication_name FROM prescriptions JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN medications ON prescriptions.medication_id = medications.medication_id

SELECT medications.medication_name, treatments.effectiveness_score FROM medications JOIN prescriptions ON medications.medication_id = prescriptions.medication_id JOIN treatments ON prescriptions.prescription_id = treatments.prescription_id ORDER BY treatments.effectiveness_score DESC
